definition: generic word for peoples or states of south China or south Asia at different historical periods/abbr. for Vietnam 越南
to exceed/to climb over/to surpass/the more... the more
to run/to run away/to escape/to run around (on errands etc)/(of a gas or liquid) to leak or evaporate/(verb complement) away/off

sentences.english: Recommended for trail runners who frequently mix in some roads and don't want to sacrifice off-road traction.
sentences.chinese: 经常混合路跑的，又不想牺牲越野跑抓地力的跑者。

sentences.english: Directional cross-country running requires athletes to possess very good intellectual foundation.
sentences.chinese: 定向越野跑要求运动员要具备非常好的智能基础。

sentences.english: The event's prizes offered by top trail shoes brands Tecnica .
sentences.chinese: 本次赛事由顶级越野跑鞋品牌泰尼卡提供奖品。

sentences.english: I want to explore my limits, it's my main goal in trail running.
sentences.chinese: 我想要挑战我的极限，这是我越野跑的主要目标。

sentences.english: It is a important factor to determine result that the tactics of directional cross-country running is used.
sentences.chinese: 定向越野跑战术运用是决定比赛成绩的重要因素。

definition: ultramarathon/abbr. for 超級馬拉松|超级马拉松[chao1 ji2 ma3 la1 song1]
to run/to jog/(military) to march at the double
race of several days/many day competition
horse race/to ride a horse at a fast pace/wet dream
